title: Reality Check: Why Tesla and Alphabet Shares Cracked and What it Means for the AI Rally
description: The global market’s focus on a few key AI stocks, particularly the Magnificent 7, has driven significant performance in the S&P 500 and Nasdaq Composite. However, recent results from major players like Tesla and Alphabet have sparked concerns. Tesla’s disappointing earnings led to a 12.3% drop in its stock, its worst in four years, while Alphabet’s investment-heavy strategy raised questions about future AI returns. As investors shift from AI and tech stocks to mid- and small-cap stocks, the AI sector faces scrutiny. While the long-term potential for AI remains, July 2024 might signal a shift in investor sentiment.
